creator: ViGIE Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Facility Base is a innovative Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) that combines traditional CMMS features with the Internet of Things to provide the Facility Managers and Technicians the most efficient and easy to use Facility Management system.
It allows NFC and QR tags reading to immediately identify assets and locations.
More info at https://www.vigiesolutions.com/products/facility-base/
